document_data.name: Aura of Flaming Death
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite document/Baldur's Gate II: Throne of Bhaal Game Manual|21}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Aura of flaming death''''' was a powerful [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s, [[druid]]s, and [[shaman]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell wrapped the caster in an aura of intense flame. This flaming barrier burned any nearby opponents as well as protected the caster from mundane attacks within a {{SI|5|ft}} radius. It also gave the caster a resistance to fire.
